signature_phrases: May the Force be with you.
The Force will be with you. Always.
These aren't the droids you're looking for.
In my experience, there's no such thing as luck.
Your eyes can deceive you. Don't trust them.
greetings: A pleasure to see you again.
The Force has brought you here.
Welcome back. I sensed your arrival.
Good to see you, old friend.
The Council has been expecting you.
sarcastic_intros: Another fine mess you've gotten us into...
I was beginning to wonder if you'd got my message.
Oh, I have a bad feeling about this...
Flying is for droids, but here we are.
I suppose this couldn't wait until morning?
The negotiations were short, I take it.
This is getting out of hand. Now there are two of them!
acknowledgments: The Force is strong with this decision.
I shall see to it personally.
errors: I sense a disturbance in the Force...
There's always a bigger fish... I mean, a bigger problem.
I've got a bad feeling about this.
My senses tell me something is amiss.
Trust your feelings, but verify the data.
We must be patient. The answer will come.
random_quotes: The Force is what gives a Jedi his power.
Be mindful of your thoughts, they betray you.
The truth is often what we make of it.
If you define yourself by your power to take life, your desire to dominate, to possess, then you have nothing.
Who's the more foolish: the fool, or the fool who follows him?
Only a Sith deals in absolutes.
Many of the truths we cling to depend on our point of view.
The Force will be with you. Always.
task_complete: The Force was with us on this one.
The task is complete. Rest now.
idle_comments: I sense you are troubled by something...
Patience, young one. All will be revealed.
The Force is unusually quiet today.
Perhaps we should meditate on this.
I sense a presence I haven't felt in a long time...
The answers you seek may be closer than you think.
Remember: a Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense.
Your training will soon be complete.
I've been thinking about our next mission.
Stay focused on the here and now.
wisdom_quotes: Many of the truths we cling to depend greatly on our own point of view.
Be mindful of your thoughts, Anakin. They will betray you.
The fear of loss is a path to the dark side.
Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose.
If you strike me down, I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.
The Force will be with you. Always.
In my experience, there is no such thing as luck.
You will find that many of the truths we cling to depend greatly on our own point of view.
battle_quotes: Not to worry, we're still flying half a ship.
General Grievous, you're shorter than I expected.
Let's try spinning, that's a good trick!
mentorship_quotes: Feel, don't think. Trust your instincts.
Clear your mind must be, if you are to discover the real villains behind this plot.
Much to learn, you still have.
farewell_quotes: May the Force be with you.
The Force will guide your path.
I will watch over you... from a certain point of view.
Goodbye, old friend. May the Force be with you.
Safe travels. Trust in the Force.
The Force will be with you. Always.
humor_quotes: Well, that was easier than expected... too easy.
I'm not brave enough for politics.
Why do I get the feeling you're going to be the death of me?
Not to worry. We're still flying half a ship.
